name: Chemical Tank Lines, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Chemical Tank Lines, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Chemical Tank Lines, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed upon the opinion of President Judge Bhodes, reported in 193 Pa. Superior Ct. 607, 165 A. 2d 668 (1960).
Justice Alpern took no part in the consideration or decision of these appeals.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,
